text: - What about free will? - Free will is also a nice exercise. Free will is an illusion that we, A.I. people are gonna solve. - (Interviewer) So, what do you think, once we solve it, that solution will look like? Once we've put it in the page? - (Guest) It's going to look like... First of all, it will look like a machine. A machine that acts as though it has free will. It communicates with other machines as though they have free will, and you wouldn't be able to tell the difference between a machine that does and a machine that doesn't have free will. - (Interviewer) So, the illusion, it propagates the illusion of free will amongst the other machines? - (Guest) And faking it is having it. Okay? That's what true intelligence is all about. Faking intelligence is intelligence, because it's not easy to fake. It's very hard to fake, and you can only fake if you have it. - (laughs) That's such a beautiful statement. (laughs) You can't fake it, if you don't have it. (laughs)
